items.title: Acadia Healthcare Stock Tanks After Warning Of Litigation Surge
items.description: Acadia Healthcare stock fell after revising its 2025 outlook due to higher litigation costs stemming from patient-related lawsuits. read more

items.title: King Charles Signs Historic Law Granting Bitcoin And Crypto Legal Property Status In The UK
items.description: The United Kingdom has officially recognized cryptocurrencies as personal property under law, marking a watershed moment for digital asset holders acr...

items.title: Iron Ore Stability Faces Long-Term Headwinds, Study
items.description: BMI projects rising iron ore prices in 2026 due to elevated demand but warns of a downward trend in the following years. read more

items.title: Tesla Rival Rivian Sees 24% Sales Surge In November Amid CEO RJ Scaringe's EV Credit Comments, Elon Musk-Style Pay Package
items.description: Tesla rival Rivian saw an increase in sales in November, selling over 4,500 units of its R1T and R1S vehicles. read more
